ability.DragonRise.description: When the Pokémon enters the field, if it is Dragon-type, its Special Attack, Attack, and Speed are boosted for 3 turns. The boosts increase each turn.
ability.FastStart.description: For the first 3 rounds after the Pokémon enters the field, its attack and speed increase by 50%, and the effect ends after 3 rounds.
pixelmon.abilities.dragon_rise.boost: %s's Dragon Rise: Special Attack +%d%%, Attack +%d%%, Speed +%d%% (Turn %d)
pixelmon.abilities.dragon_rise.dragon_as: %s's Dragon Ascent is empowered by Dragon Rise!
pixelmon.abilities.faststart: %s has entered the Fast Start state! Speed and attack have been greatly increased!
pixelmon.abilities.faststartend: The Fast Start effect of %s has ended! Speed and attack have returned to normal.
